data.title: Is Fuji and Fujitsu the same company?

data.text:
No, both are Japanese companies, but are separate.

Fujitsu Limited (å¯Œå£«é€šæ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾ FujitsÅ« Kabushiki-Kaisha?) is a Japanese multinational information technology equipment and services company headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.[4] It is the world's third-largest IT services provider measured by revenues
